channel.title: clickingButtons.java code
channel.description: Alright. Well I am adding new features and etc in my server, but when I click an unused button I don't get the code for it. Looking into the clickingButtons.java it seems I don't have the command (or what ever you feel like calling it) that forces the cmd of the server to tell the owner(if rights are set correctly) what the ID is. I'm using Delta, anyone have this code please?

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“sebblol, post:2, topic:440835”]If you mean that you want the button id to show in cmd here is the code for that

[quote] if(c.playerRights == 3)
System.out.println(c.playerName+ " - Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId);[/quote]

if want it to show in chatbox on server

[quote] if(c.playerRights == 3)
c.sM(c.playerName+ " - Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId);[/quote]

Add that in clikingmost.java above

switch (c.actionButtonId) {[/quote]

I know all about that
I just didn’t know the code.
Ironically your giving me the code, and it’s for your source.

item.title: clickingButtons.java code

item.description:
@sebblol wrote:

If you mean that you want the button id to show in cmd here is the code for that

if(c.playerRights == 3) System.out.println(c.playerName+ " - Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId);

if want it to show in chatbox on server

if(c.playerRights == 3) c.sM(c.playerName+ " - Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId);

Add that in clikingmost.java above

switch (c.actionButtonId) {
